thread.title: You can now use Google Street View in virtual reality on your phone - Tech
thread.title_full: You can now use Google Street View in virtual reality on your phone - Tech News - Digital Spy

author: Tasha Hegarty
title: You can now use Google Street View in virtual reality on your phone - Tech
text: Google Street View has gone virtual reality.Android and iOS users can now see the world in all its 360-degree glory via the new Cardboard button that's been added to Street View apps. © Digital Spy Although it's been a hidden feature on Android since last year, it is now finally iOS compatible, Google developers announced.Google's Cardboard VR headset, priced at £20, has become popular for its value for money, while it only needs some minor origami skills to put together.Google also announced that Cardboard is proving to be a major competitor to more expensive VR headset models.Google Cardboard is now available in more than 100 countries and Cardboard-ready apps have been installed 15 million times.
